About Us

GENERAL CONTRACTOR AND CONSTRUCTION MANAGEMENT

A combination of the talents of professionals with both
construction & architectural expertise

S.S.Civil Projects Private Limited

We at S.S.Civil Projects Private Limited, are firm believers of the school of thought that creating a better world requires teamwork, partnerships, and collaboration. Thus when our team serves you, we bring together vast expertise, estimating know-how, cost control procedures, management systems, purchasing power and years of solid construction experience.
A unique combination of engineering and construction.
Developing our client's dream space for their business.
We’ve constructed some of the most iconic projects.
